programmes.show_description: Go on, give your wardrobe a refresh with our stylish selection from JDY, a fashion brand dedicated to creating pieces that showcase your individuality.
It's your last chance to get your hands on these great deals from our Fashion event.
Treat yourself to a little luxury this season with Radley London's gorgeous bags and accessories. Discover on-trend totes, chic cross-bodies and much more in this showcase of covetable handbags.
Discover White Stuff in this show, featuring inspired fashion that combines eclectic prints, flattering shapes and fresh designs. Update your wardrobe with pieces you'll wear again and again.
Harness the beauty of pearls with the Lara Pearls Collection, offering stunning jewellery set with elegant pearls for over 20 years. Discover a piece for your jewellery box or a loved one's today.
Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.

Let your spring style bloom with a little help from Ruth Langsford's renowned fashion range, from trusty basics that you'll love to wear day in, day out, to wow-worthy statement style.
Discover the latest trends from the biggest fashion brands with a little help from QVC presenter, Katy.

Step out in style in Skechers! Renowned for their on-trend, sporty designs, you can now find their fab shoes at QVC too!
Easy care, easy wear, easy elegance in this mix and match collection of unique and versatile pieces created for the smart, elegant, busy women seeking comfort that doesn't compromise style.

Fall in love with Osprey London's leather goods in this show, from beautiful bags to wow-worthy wallets. Perfect gifts for loved ones or yourself, you're sure to discover something you'll adore.
Refresh your style with Vero Moda! Discover on-trend pieces and must-have essentials to elevate your wardrobe for every season. Tune in for effortless fashion inspiration.
Every item in this stunning selection of gold jewellery contains rare Welsh gold from the Clogau St David's Gold Mine - the mine that has provided gold for Royal wedding rings.

Tune in to see the modern and sophisticated Finery London womenswear range, with a focus on stylish detail and beautiful fabrics to make sure your wardrobe reflects your individuality.
A fashionable and comfortable footwear range with biomechanically-designed orthotic technology, which helps restore natural foot function and promote well-being with every step.
Discover Apricot fashion, showcasing chic wardrobe staples and elegant pieces to bring your style to life. From fabulous prints to bold pops of colours, discover how you can enliven your look today!
